DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Different Dosages Vitamin K2
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin K group name number compound : K1 present chloroplast green vegetable , K2 microbial origin . Lactic bacteria produce mixture high menaquinones , include menaquinone-7 , menaquinone-8 , menaquinone-9 . Higher menaquinones long half-life time ( 3 day rather 1 hour vitamin K1 ) ; K2 vitamins also transport extra hepatic tissue bone vessel wall whereas K1 preferentially transport liver . Nothing know yet efficacy bacterial K2 vitamin vivo K function ( carboxylation essential protein ) . This study describe dose-response experiment different dosage bacterial K2 compare one select dose K1 placebo . The efficacy conclude carboxylation bone Gla-protein osteocalcin vascular Gla-protein matrix-Gla protein ( MGP ) .
